entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
